description:
Mikochi is chosen to be a songstress and she must learn how to deal with the new attention. Meanwhile, an unexpected gift arrives.
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: Futari no Utahime to Glass no Tou to Ippuku no Coffee
Les deux divas / La lanterne de verre / Une tasse de café
The Two Songstresses / The Glass Lamp / A Cup of Coffee
ふたりの歌姫 と ガラスの灯 と 一服の珈琲
두 명의 가희 / 유리의 빛 / 한 잔의 커피
